originalText.text: Dr Vidali and his staff are Amazing. All of the staff helped the process go so smoothly. When we had a question they emailed me back almost immediately and even afternoon/nighttime. They never made us feel like we were a bother. Dr Vidali is a God-send. My 15yo had been to almost every specialist before we got to him. He was the only doctor who listen to my daughter and made her feel validated. If I could give them 10 stars I would.

text.text: Dr Vidali and his staff are Amazing. All of the staff helped the process go so smoothly. When we had a question they emailed me back almost immediately and even afternoon/nighttime. originalText.text: BRI was the light in our darkest time. I started a low dose fertility treatment in 2019 and suffered my first miscarriage. I then went on to try 1- IUI and 2- rounds of IVF with 2-embryo transfers.. all resulting in miscarriages. In January 2021 I had a consult with BRI. They did extensive testing and set up my protocol. In April 2021 we did an embryo transfer and in December 2021 we welcomed our beautiful miracle, a baby boy. After 4 miscarriages I thought the chances of carrying my own baby was no longer an option. But something in my gut told me I needed to at least try with BRI and I am so grateful I did. Also, I just want to add that at 9 weeks pregnant I slipped and fell down the stairs. I ended up in the hospital with a massive hematoma, anemic, and needing a blood transfusion. The hospital called Dr. Vidali and explained the situation because I was so worried about the baby and coming off all of the meds that helped me get to that point. Dr. Vidali was so responsive, day or night, weekday or weekend. He put my mind at ease and explained everything to me when I was terrified. If you want exceptional care, go to BRI. Thank you BRI Team!
